tool_description: Query for news, market moving, price quotes, chart, indices, analysis from investors and experts, etc...
name: Seeking Alpha
title: Seeking Alpha

api_list.name: symbols/get-ratings (Deprecated)
api_list.description:
Get ratings data for specific symbol
* This endpoint is replaced by .../symbols/get-factor-grades and .../symbols/get-quant-rating-histories

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data, only one is allowed at a time.

api_list.name: symbols/get-momentum (Deprecated)
api_list.description:
Get momentum of specific symbol
* This endpoint is deprecated,  you need to use .../symbols/v2/get-momentum endpoint instead.

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data.  Separating  by comma to query multiple symbols at once, ex : aapl,tsla

api_list.description: Get top holdings of specific symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data.  Separating  by comma to query multiple symbols at once, ex : aapl,tsla

api_list.description: Get factor grades for specific symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data, only one is allowed at a time.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data, only one is allowed at a time.

api_list.description: Get key data of specific symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol

api_list.name: symbols/get-analyst-recommendations

required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../symbols/get-meta-data

optional_parameters.name: return_window

optional_parameters.name: group_by_month
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not the data is grouped by month

api_list.name: symbols/get-analyst-price-target

optional_parameters.name: group_by_month

optional_parameters.name: return_window
optional_parameters.description: The return window

api_list.name: symbols/get-earnings
api_list.description: Get information  in Earnings tab of specific symbol

required_parameters.name: ticker_ids
required_parameters.description: The value of id fields returned in .../symbols/get-meta-data endpoint.  Separating  by comma to query multiple tickers at once, ex : 1742,146

optional_parameters.name: period_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : quarterly|annual

optional_parameters.name: group_by_month
optional_parameters.description: true|false

optional_parameters.name: estimates_data_items
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : eps_gaap_actual,eps_gaap_consensus_mean,eps_normalized_actual,eps_normalized_consensus_mean,revenue_actual,revenue_consensus_mean,eps_primary . Separated by comma for multiple options

optional_parameters.name: revisions_data_items
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : eps_normalized_actual,eps_normalized_consensus_mean,revenue_consensus_mean . Separated by comma for multiple options

api_list.name: symbols/get-holdings
api_list.description: Get information  in Holdings tab of specific symbol

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data.  Separating  by comma to query multiple symbols at once, ex : aapl,tsla

api_list.name: symbols/get-estimates
api_list.description: Get estimated EPS/revenue of specific symbol by annual or quarterly

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data, only one is allowed at a time.

optional_parameters.name: data_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : eps|revenues

optional_parameters.name: period_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : quarterly|annual

api_list.name: symbols/v2/get-chart
api_list.description: This endpoint reproduces public data and features in Charting tab.

required_parameters.name: symbols
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data. Separating by comma to query multiple symbols at once, ex : aapl,tsla

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Starting date to query for data, the format is yyyy-MM-dd

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: Ending date to query for data, the format is yyyy-MM-dd

optional_parameters.name: metrics
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : total_revenue|ebitda_yoy|net_income|diluted_eps_growth|pe_ratio|pb_ratio|price_cf_ratio|ps_ratio|price_tang_book|ev_ebit|ev_12m_sales_ratio|enterprise_value|ev_ebitda|market_cap|gross_margin|net_margin|operating_income_ebit_yoy|normalized_net_income|tangible_book|total_assets|levered_free_cash_flow_yoy|diluted_weighted_average_shares_outstanding|ebit_margin|normalized_net_income_margin|ebitda_margin|levered_fcf_margin|return_on_equity|return_on_avg_tot_assets|return_on_total_capital|assets_turnover|net_interest_income|gross_loans|total_common_equity|sga_margin|ebt_margin|net_interest_income_per_total_revenue

api_list.name: symbols/get-chart
api_list.description: Get data to draw chart for specific symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol to query for data, only one is allowed at a time.

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 1D|5D|1M|6M|YTD|1Y|3Y|5Y|10Y|MAX

api_list.name: market/get-dividend-investing
api_list.description: Get dividend investing
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://seeking-alpha.p.rapidapi.com/market/get-dividend-investing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: comments/get-contents
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get many comment's content at once by comment ids.

required_parameters.name: comment_ids
required_parameters.description: The value of id field returned in .../comments/v2/list endpoint. You may pass this parameter multiple times to get content of many comments at once. Ex : ...&comment_ids=90666350&comment_ids=90666780&...

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id returned in .../articles/list or .../articles/list-trending or .../articles/list-wall-street-breakfast endpoints

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty

api_list.name: comments/v2/list
api_list.description: List all comments relating to a post or article or news. This endpoint only returns site map structure of comments relating to a post. You need to use along with .../comments/get-contents endpoint to get the contents.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id returned in .../articles/list or .../articles/list-trending or .../articles/list-wall-street-breakfast endpoints

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty

api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get sub or nested comments of another comment

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of id returned in .../articles/list or .../articles/list-trending or .../articles/list-wall-street-breakfast endpoints

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty

optional_parameters.description: Leave empty to load the first page or get suitable value of the last comment id returned right in this endpoint with parentId being \"null\" to load the next page

optional_parameters.description: Order by newest : -top_parent_id | Order by oldest : leave empty

optional_parameters.name: parent_count
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose (max 20)
